MajorClaims.MC1: working at home is worse and less efficient than working in the office
MajorClaims.MC2: working in the office is obviously better than working at home in terms of efficiency

Claims.C1: while working in the office, people can interact with their colleges instantly
Claims.C2: working at home has many disadvantages that will no doubt lower the efficiency of works
Claims.C3: It not only has the advantage of working with colleges but also it provides a real working atmosphere that can never be grasped if people choose to work at home

Premises.P1: Think about the big project that a group is working on, if any group member has new idea about the project, he/she can assemble his/her colleges right away and discuss
Premises.P2: They can either get help from colleges or discuss about the work together
Premises.P3: It's more efficient and straight-forward than talking in the phone
Premises.P4: if one’s computer or Internet has any breakdown, he/she can call the MIS staff to fix
Premises.P5: people are easily distracted while working at home
Premises.P6: It's hard to concentrate on work if people can grab the TV remote or some junk foods right away
Premises.P7: while people are working at home, there will be no one supervising them, thus raises the chance of loafing
Premises.P8: people who work at home are more likely to miss the important events happening in the office, like some announcements from the boss
